Container.Name: SaturdayMorningPlex
Container.Overview: SaturdayMorningPlex automatically generates Saturday morning cartoon-style playlists from your Plex TV library. It creates 52 weekly playlists per year, distributing episodes evenly across shows while filtering by content rating. Perfect for creating a nostalgic Saturday morning viewing experience for kids!

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the web interface

Config.Name: Plex Server URL
Config.Description: Direct URL to your Plex server (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:32400)

Config.Name: Plex Token
Config.Description: Plex authentication token (see documentation for how to get this)

Config.Name: TV Library Name
Config.Description: Name of your Plex TV Shows library section

Config.Name: Content Ratings
Config.Description: Comma-separated content ratings to include (e.g., G,PG,TV-Y,TV-Y7)

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Logging level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR

Config.Name: Config Storage
Config.Description: Persistent storage for logs and configuration
